thread.title: José Henrique

author: José Henrique
title: José Henrique
text:
Transferwise is indeed an excellent money transfer service. The only remarks I would make about is the following.
The only payment option available to Brazil is "boleto", which:
- causes a bit of delay in transferring (because it is payed in a bank, then it take 1-2days for the payment to be settled (meaning, the money arrives at Transferwise in 1-2 days, not realtime));
- created an inconsistent status when I accidentally cancelled an order for which the "boleto" was already issued, which the system identified as a "pending transaction", temporarily taking some of the monthly transfer limit (until the "boleto" due date).
It would be nice to have credit/debit card transfer options, as well as bank transfer options, which could also speed up transfers.
